title: Pixel 4 XL Radar Sensitivity - Issues
content:
Pixel 4XL with default radar turned on. 
While device is on a stand at my desk watching Youtube, videos are constantly started back at the beginning.   Obviously it would seem that I am the culprit...that I must have waved my hand to the left and caused the radar to detect my intention to restart the content from the start. 

In most cases, I am simply typing on a keyboard. How can movements as small as my fingers moving on a keyboard trigger the radar.   Any time that I have intentionally tried to use the radar to change content, I have to make very large and deliberate motions.
